other_tests.findings: Gross purulence was revealed during the procedure.
Reactive squamous metaplasia with submucosal proliferation of macrophages, containing Michaelis–Guttmann bodies.
Complete resection of the lesion was achieved according to subsequent CT scans.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 6 months post-surgery, no recurrence of the contrast-enhancing lesion was observed.

other_tests.findings: Presence of histiocytes and macrophages with Michaelis–Guttmann bodies.
